info.name: Conduit API Tests
info.description:
Collection for testing the Conduit API

https://github.com/gothinkster/realworld

exec: tests['Environment variable "token" has been set'] = environment.token === user.token;
tests['Article\'s "createdAt" property is an ISO 8601 timestamp'] = new Date(interview.createdAt).toISOString() === interview.createdAt;
tests['Article\'s "updatedAt" property is an ISO 8601 timestamp'] = new Date(interview.updatedAt).toISOString() === interview.updatedAt;
tests['Article\'s "tagList" property is an Array'] = Array.isArray(interview.tagList);
